Package gdi.game.map

Class MapTile

java.lang.Object
gdi.game.WorldObject
gdi.game.Drawable
gdi.game.map.MapTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
gdi.game.DrawableObject, gdi.game.UpdatableObject, Iterable<MapSprite>
Direct Known Subclasses:
NiceTile
public class MapTile extends gdi.game.Drawable implements Iterable<MapSprite>
This class represent on tile on a Map.
Version:
1.0
Author:
frank

      public final void render(Graphics2D g)
      Description copied from interface: gdi.game.DrawableObject

    • update

      public final void update(double deltaTime, double time)
      Description copied from interface: gdi.game.UpdatableObject
      Called periodically from the game loop. Use this method to update the state of your world. Do not perform drawing operations (use the World.render(double)-method instead), as it might cause inconsistencies when you interleave draw and update code.
      Specified by:
      update in interface gdi.game.UpdatableObject
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - The time (in seconds) that passed since the method was called last
      time - The game time this loop was started at
      See Also:
      • World.update(double, double)
